entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump Hey boss the next time somebody wrongly blames you for 91,000 covid-19 deaths just say to them very quietly what about the 609,000 plus of Americans that are killed by DNC backed abortion clinics every year, sick and sorry world killing healthy babies democratic murder inc.
